html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-01752022-02-24,  GAC,  ,  , 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to 1) add thirty-one (31) individuals and nineteen (19) entities to Schedule 1 of the Regulations; and 2) move five (5) entities from Schedule 2, and three (3) entities from Schedule 3, to Schedule 1 of the Regulations to broaden the prohibitions imposed and align Canada with similar prohibitions being imposed by allies.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0029 Publication Date: 2022-03-16
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to 1) add thirty-one (31) individuals and nineteen (19) entities to Schedule 1 of the Regulations; and 2) move five (5) entities from Schedule 2, and three (3) entities from Schedule 3, to Schedule 1 of the Regulations to broaden the prohibitions imposed and align Canada with similar prohibitions being imposed by allies.
